i used to be completely anti-gun without considering any of the alternative. i suggest anyone who thinks this way to check out thehighroad.org, which is mostly a pro-gun forum. just being in there for a few weeks really opened my eyes to guns and allowed me to see the other side of the issue.
I second that. The pros and cons of guns and situations can be discussed without hysteria and ignorant opinion.
I agree its a proven fact owning a gun decimates the odds that your going to get robbed or any other attack on your property or on you

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  the high road
